function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of information on competing financial interests or personal relationships","Impact":"Potential bias in the work reported in the paper, leading to inaccurate or skewed results","Mitigation":"Require disclosure of competing financial interests and personal relationships, and establish clear guidelines for reporting","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Authors, researchers, and stakeholders relying on the paper's findings","Owner":"Research institutions, journals, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Population size in the simulation not specified","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling and inability to draw meaningful conclusions about disease propagation in the built environment","Mitigation":"Ensure that the simulation includes accurate and representative population sizes, and clearly state the assumptions made","Technologies":"Simulation modeling software, statistical tools for data analysis","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and organizations using the simulation results","Owner":"Research institutions, simulation developers"},{"Description":"Unemployment generated by the onus of keeping people at home","Impact":"Social and economic consequences, including financial hardship and social instability","Mitigation":"Implement policies and initiatives to support affected individuals, such as income support, job retraining, and mental health services","Technologies":"Online job platforms, remote work technology, economic modeling software","People":"Employees, employers, government agencies, and communities","Owner":"Government, human resources departments, economic development organizations"}]}
